scripts.resize-images: identify -format '%w %h %i\n' ./products_images/*.jpg | grep --invert-match '500 500' | awk '{print $3}' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 mogrify -verbose -resize '490x490' -extent '500x500'
scripts.upload-images: npm run resize-images; git add ./products_images/.; git commit -m "Upload new images"; git push
